a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child and maternal malnutrition death rates vs. GDP per capita, 2021
The estimated number of deaths attributed to child and maternal malnutrition, per 100,000 people. GDP per
capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Bank (2023)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
